ing: 1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
des: "This is a lower-fat version of a traditional spicy sauce for po' boys, crab cakes, or whatever else you can think of."
ins: Blend yogurt, mayonnaise, mustard, pickle juice, capers, horseradish, garlic, hot pepper sauce, cayenne, and paprika together in the bowl of a food processor. Chill until ready to serve, at least 30 minutes.
